00016 #ifndef nmrrelaxfitH
00017 #define nmrrelaxfitH
00018 
00019 #include "xlistnode.h"
00020 
00021 #include <gsl/gsl_vector.h>
00022 #include <gsl/gsl_matrix.h>
00023 
00024 class XRelaxFunc : public XNode
00025 {
00026     XNODE_OBJECT
00027 protected:
00028     XRelaxFunc(const char *name, bool runtime) : XNode(name, runtime) {}
00029 public:
00030     virtual ~XRelaxFunc() {}
00031     //! called during fitting
00032     //! \param f f(t, it1) will be passed
00033     //! \param dfdt df/d(it1) will be passed
00034     //! \param t a time P1 or 2tau
00035     //! \param data a relaxation function
00036     //! \param it1 1/T1 or 1/T2   
00037     virtual void relax(double *f, double *dfdt, double t, double it1) = 0;   
00038   
00039     static int relax_f (const gsl_vector * x, void *params,
00040                         gsl_vector * f);  
00041     static int relax_df (const gsl_vector * x, void *params,
00042                          gsl_matrix * J);  
00043     static int relax_fdf (const gsl_vector * x, void *params,
00044                           gsl_vector * f, gsl_matrix * J);   
00045 }; 
00046 
00047 class XRelaxFuncList : public XAliasListNode<XRelaxFunc>
00048 {
00049     XNODE_OBJECT
00050 protected:
00051     XRelaxFuncList(const char *name, bool runtime);
00052 public:
00053     virtual ~XRelaxFuncList() {}
00054 };
00055

00058 #endif
